articles.author: Arthur Parashar
articles.title: Michelle and Barack Obama hit the sightseeing trail to visit Montserrat monastery with Spielberg - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former president and first lady looked relaxed as they donned casual clothes and sunglasses while waving at tourists during a trip to the popular Montserrat monastery in Catalonia.
articles.content: Barack and Michelle Obama hit the sightseeing trail to visit the Montserrat monastery with Hollywood director Steven Spielberg - the day after watching Bruce Springsteen return to the stage in Spain.… [+4600 chars]

articles.title: Coronation: King Charles to use restored historic chairs - Sky News
articles.description: In the interests of sustainability, the King has chosen thrones and ceremonial chairs made for previous coronations.These chairs of the estate were made in 1...
